testcase.name: As a user I can log into the secure area
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the login page✅ When I login with tomsmith and SuperSecretPassword!✅ Then I should see a flash message saying You logged into a secure area!

testcase.name: As a user I can log into the secure area
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the login page✅ When I login with foobar and barfoo✅ Then I should see a flash message saying Your username is invalid!
